EmailTemplate.subject: Hatco Corp Assures VDI Performance, Grows Efficiently, & Saves Thousands
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://cdn.turbonomic.com/wp-content/uploads/Turbonomic-Hatco-Success-Story.pdf]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Seeking to remedy performance problems and accurately plan for growth, Hatco turned to Turbonomic. As a result, Hatco was able to increase utilization by more than 60% and increase IT staff productivity by more than 40%.
What’s more? Hatco attained a complete return on investment in less than 3 weeks.
<[[https://cdn.turbonomic.com/wp-content/uploads/Turbonomic-Hatco-Success-Story.pdf]]>
Did we peak your interest yet? See how over 1,900 of our customers <[[https://turbonomic.com/customers/customers-by-industry/]]> leverage workload automation to simultaneously optimize performance, cost and policy compliance in real-time.
Regards,
Team Turbonomic
